# the License.
include_guard(GLOBAL)

include($ENV{PW_ROOT}/pw_build/pigweed.cmake)

set(dir_pw_third_party_boringssl "" CACHE PATH "Path to the boringssl installation.")

if("${dir_pw_third_party_boringssl}" STREQUAL "")
  pw_add_error_target(pw_third_party.boringssl
    MESSAGE
    "Attempted to use boringssl without configuring it, see "
    "pigweed.dev/third_party/boringssl/"
  )
  return()
endif()

pw_add_library(pw_third_party.boringssl.public_config INTERFACE
  PUBLIC_INCLUDES
    ${dir_pw_third_party_boringssl}/src/include
    public
  PUBLIC_DEFINES
    OPENSSL_NO_THREADS_CORRUPT_MEMORY_AND_LEAK_SECRETS_IF_THREADED
)

# Hardcoding overrides to use pw_assert. This could potentially be done in a
# more clever way.
pw_add_library(pw_third_party.boringssl.private_config INTERFACE
  PRIVATE_INCLUDES
    ${dir_pw_third_party_boringssl}
  PUBLIC_DEFINES
    BORINGSSL_ALLOW_CXX_RUNTIME
    OPENSSL_SMALL
    OPENSSL_NO_ASM
    OPENSSL_NO_SOCK
    NDEBUG
  PUBLIC_COMPILE_OPTIONS
    # Note: These need to be public when compiling boringssl, but this config
    # is added as a private dependency below which prevents the flags from
    # propagating to dependents of boringssl.
    -Wno-unused-function
    -Wno-conversion
    -Wno-unused-parameter
    -Wno-char-subscripts
    -Wno-cast-qual
    -Wno-nested-anon-types
    -Wno-gnu-anonymous-struct
    -Wno-overlength-strings
    -Wno-extra-semi
    -Wno-deprecated-this-capture
    -fpermissive
)

pw_add_library(pw_third_party.boringssl STATIC
  SOURCES
    ${dir_pw_third_party_boringssl}/err_data.c
    ${dir_pw_third_party_boringssl}/src/crypto/asn1/a_bitstr.c
    ${dir_pw_third_party_boringssl}/src/crypto/asn1/a_bool.c
    ${dir_pw_third_party_boringssl}/src/crypto/asn1/a_d2i_fp.c
    ${dir_pw_third_party_boringssl}/src/crypto/asn1/a_dup.c
    ${dir_pw_third_party_boringssl}/src/crypto/asn1/a_gentm.c
    ${dir_pw_third_party_boringssl}/src/crypto/asn1/a_i2d_fp.c
    ${dir_pw_third_party_boringssl}/src/crypto/asn1/a_int.c
    ${dir_pw_third_party_boringssl}/src/crypto/asn1/a_mbstr.c
    ${dir_pw_third_party_boringssl}/src/crypto/asn1/a_object.c
    ${dir_pw_third_party_boringssl}/src/crypto/asn1/a_octet.c
    ${dir_pw_third_party_boringssl}/src/crypto/asn1/a_strex.c
    ${dir_pw_third_party_boringssl}/src/crypto/asn1/a_strnid.c
    ${dir_pw_third_party_boringssl}/src/crypto/asn1/a_time.c
    ${dir_pw_third_party_boringssl}/src/crypto/asn1/a_type.c
    ${dir_pw_third_party_boringssl}/src/crypto/asn1/a_utctm.c
    ${dir_pw_third_party_boringssl}/src/crypto/asn1/asn1_lib.c
    ${dir_pw_third_party_boringssl}/src/crypto/asn1/asn1_par.c
    ${dir_pw_third_party_boringssl}/src/crypto/asn1/asn_pack.c
    ${dir_pw_third_party_boringssl}/src/crypto/asn1/f_int.c
    ${dir_pw_third_party_boringssl}/src/crypto/asn1/f_string.c
    ${dir_pw_third_party_boringssl}/src/crypto/asn1/internal.h
    ${dir_pw_third_party_boringssl}/src/crypto/asn1/posix_time.c
    ${dir_pw_third_party_boringssl}/src/crypto/asn1/tasn_dec.c
    ${dir_pw_third_party_boringssl}/src/crypto/asn1/tasn_enc.c
    ${dir_pw_third_party_boringssl}/src/crypto/asn1/tasn_fre.c
    ${dir_pw_third_party_boringssl}/src/crypto/asn1/tasn_new.c
    ${dir_pw_third_party_boringssl}/src/crypto/asn1/tasn_typ.c
    ${dir_pw_third_party_boringssl}/src/crypto/asn1/tasn_utl.c
    ${dir_pw_third_party_boringssl}/src/crypto/base64/base64.c
    ${dir_pw_third_party_boringssl}/src/crypto/bio/bio.c

    #src/crypto/bio/connect.c

    #src/crypto/bio/socket.c

    ${dir_pw_third_party_boringssl}/src/crypto/bn_extra/bn_asn1.c

    pw_third_party.boringssl.private_config
  PUBLIC_DEPS
    pw_assert
    pw_tls_client.time
    pw_third_party.boringssl.public_config
  PUBLIC_INCLUDES
    # Contains a faked "sysdeps/sys/socket.h"
    sysdeps
)

pw_add_test(pw_third_party.boringssl.build_test
  SOURCES
    build_test.cc
  PRIVATE_DEPS
    pw_bytes
    pw_third_party.boringssl
  GROUPS
    pw_third_party.boringssl
)
